alert.note: Alert for Logan; Phillips (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 5:55PM MDT until May 10 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Logan County in northeastern Colorado... Western Phillips County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 645 PM MDT. * At 555 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southeast of St Petersburg, or 23 miles west of Holyoke, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... St Petersburg around 600 PM MDT. Fleming around 615 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Crook, Proctor and Twin Buttes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Colorado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Colorado.
